Articles.Content:
Ok so basically make up acronyms.

Mine is currently in Research phase, and by the Law (of me) It must be given a long and impossible to remember acronym.

(O-Winged Test Bed two, Jet Engine = OWTB-II-(JE)).

And this one is one of the easier ones. I don't even remember what HS(S)C means.

Some more fun Acronyms:

Nuclear Engine, Aerospike Nozzle (NEAN)

Long Range Triple Propellant Engine (LRTPE MK II)
RCS1-WM-097: Rage-Class Series-1 War Mech #097
GSUDD: Giant Squid of Ultimate Destruction and Doom

ACE: Automatic Cleansing Explosion

ZOKESIA: Zirconium Oligopoly Kaleidoscopically Eating Silicon-Integrated Apples

FIRE: Firefighters Inherently Rescuing Economists

JEB: Juxtapositional Economist Bashing

ICE: Intramural Cookie Eating

BASIC: Bulls**t Assessment; Silly Identical Comptroller

QUAD: Quantitatively Underused Apple Delicacies

DESTROY: Destructively Economizing Silly Towel Racketeers Or Young'uns

POOL: Plinking Or Opposing Legislature

ZOKESIA: Zirconium Oligopoly Kaleidoscopically Eating Silicon-Integrated Apples

you are the best
IPC-1-Tr: Implanted Personality Core-1 "Tr////" /=Higherclearanceneeded.
TSADC-L42: The Super Apple Distribution Company - Location 42

PETRIFIED: Package-Extractable Terrestrial Roving Interest-Finding Improvising Exoskeletal Defense

(I play this game in my spare time!)

WMES-DC-097: War Mech Exterior Shell-Disguise Concept for #097

Anyone getting the subtle hints yet?

WMES-DC-097: War Mech Exterior Shell-Disguise Concept for #097

Anyone getting the subtle hints yet?

I get it, you are the war mech?

I got a couple more, zekes

ZEKES: Zokesian Economist, Keyboard-Enhanced Slacker

SKUNKWORKS: Socioeconomically Kaput Underdogs Near Kinetically Weakening Opposition and Racketeering Kerbal Spacemen

GUYRA: Guys United Yelling Random Acronyms

EXPLODE: Epic Xylophone-Playing Letter-Opening Ducks' Entrance

WRECK: We Recall Every Craft Known

NAVY: Nautically-Avenging Various Younglings

VIRUS: Victoriously Idiotic Reindeer-Using Soldiers

LOVE: Landing On Val Everyday

PROBE: Pirates Raid Often Beyond Eeloo

VAL: Victory Against Legislators

DUNA: Dreadfully-Unequipped Navigational Apparatuses

KRAKEN: Killing Rather Awesomely and Killing Every Night

ROVER: Running Over Various Errand-Runners

SPACE: Stupidity-Preventing Astronauts Call Everybody

FEAR: Flying-Epically Above Rainstorms

Edited June 3, 2013 by FallingIntoBlack

Guyra, that's us.

Guys United Yelling Random Acronyms

Government's Unsure You're Really Alien

space!space!space!

from core hanging on mech jeb pod

S.S.R.O.T.F

Super speed run on the forums.
TR - Thread reviver
Lsr is linbol system rebirth

RBTB

Here's an acronym I've created for my KSP missions:

CAMEL: Cargo And Mission Equipment Lander - A multi-mission autonomous lander that delivers cargo from orbital stations to surface bases. This can range from surface base components to rovers and equipment.

Edited December 16, 2023 by TwoCalories
